Title: GG 19 - Eine Reise durch Deutschland in 19 Artikeln
Director: Boris Anderson, Ansgar Ahlers, Marcel Ahrens
Writer: Ansgar Ahlers, Boris Anderson, Jens Baumeister
Actors: Adriana Altaras, Thomas Bading, Claudia Maria Bauer
Plot: GG 19 is a cinematic journey through Germany within 19 articles. Á la short cuts, in 19 stories, the fundamental rights of the Federal Republic of Germany become an emotional experience. Not didactic or even edifying, but always e...
